text:
@SenSchumer Here's a little strategy idea for #NewYork, Chuck:"Don't import #COVID19-infected patients into nursing homes filled with the most medically-vulnerable citizens."
Too bad you or #AndrewCuomo didn't think of that one, your casualties would be down 60%. #NegligentHomicide
